document_data.name: Darkness
document_data.mainbody: '''''Darkness''''' was a [[hishna]] [[spell]] unique to [[Maztica]], similar to ''[[darkness, 15' radius]]''. It could be used by [[cleric]]s and [[hishnashaper]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a sphere of darkness with a radius of 15 feet (5.2 m). It appeared centered around the caster, but then remained stationary independent of his or her movements.
document_data.Components: Aside from [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, ''darkness'' required some scales from the belly of a [[nightsnake]].
